subject: Re: Testing classes that rely on a datasource?
msgSnippet: ... source for ... interested I ll ... Hi, It would be nice regards
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Johannes Link" <john.link@g...> wrote:
> > Can you use another implementation of DataSource for your tests? I
> > used Apache Basic Datasource implementation from apache.org for my
> > tests.
>
> It's not very complicated to write a mock implementation of data
source for
> testing purposes. I have one lying around using hsqldb and providing
> verification of all connections being closed. If anyone's
interested I'll
> upload it.
>
> Johannes

Hi,

It would be nice

regards
